ModMetaData.name: LMC055s.Iztal计划发射装置包
ModMetaData.author: VMSpark
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Project Iztal is a personal project of mine that plans to bring some new weapons into the game. Iztal计划是我个人的一个项目，我计划在游戏中加入一些新的武器。 The launcher pack contains 3 launchers, the thermobaric launcher, the single shot grenade launcher and the reloadable rocket launcher. 发射装置包包括3个发射装置：热压发射装置、单发榴弹发射装置和可重新装载火箭发射装置。
